pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This scenery shot shows the exterior of a large, two-story brick house under an overcast sky. The house features Tudor-revival architectural elements, including a section with white stucco and dark timber framing. A black metal fence runs along the front of the property, which is landscaped with a green lawn, shrubs, and several trees. The camera slowly zooms in on the timbered detail of the house.
